product_name: REI TSA Friendly Flat Bottle Kit
long_description: Designed to meet Transportation Security Administration regulations, the REI TSA Friendly Flat Bottle Kit makes it easy to bring along your toiletries when flying. Includes 3 bottles with flip-top valves; flat bottle design allows compact storage. Color-coded bottles allow easy identification. To meet TSA regulations for carry-on items, all bottles are smaller than 3 fl. oz. The REI TSA Friendly Flat Bottle Kit includes a clear zippered storage pouch for fast processing through airport security checkpoints.
short_description: Designed to meet Transportation Security Administration regulations, the REI TSA Friendly Flat Bottle Kit makes it easy to bring along your toiletries when flying.
